welcome.subtitle: ABOUT US
welcome.title: Welcome to Sri Sathya Sai School & PU College Mysuru
welcome.description: Our school is dedicated to fostering Education in Human Values. Today's education system often prioritizes intellectual and skill development while neglecting the cultivation of good character. We believe that true education extends beyond academics to encompass moral and spiritual growth. Our mission is to nurture students who not only excel academically but also possess compassion, humility, and a sense of service towards society.
